title: 臺南市111年度橋梁維修工程開口契約(A區)
department: 臺南市政府工務局採購品管科
content:
//處理決標公告最有利標文字列印    var str_advantage = '';        var operation = '檢視公告';      var positoin = "職業";    var expertsList_title = new Array("出席會議","姓名",positoin);    var expertsList_isPresence = new Array();    var expertsList_name = new Array();    var expertsList_position = new Array();    //json字串中的isOwner    var isOwner;    var obj;    var partialView = '';     var isShowRank = false;	//但發現由json傳回的isOwner為null，由partialView來判斷是否為isOwner			var isOwnerByPview = true;		    //取得json字串中的isOwner    str_advantage = str_advantage.replace(/(\n|\r|\t)/g,"").replace(/\\/g,"\");    if (str_advantage.length > 0) {	    obj = JSON.parse(str_advantage);	            	    isOwner = obj.args.isOwner;	    if (typeof(isOwner) == undefined || isOwner == null) {	    	isOwner = isOwnerByPview;	    }				if (typeof(isOwner) != 'undefined' && isOwner == false){			if ('true' =='true') {				isShowRank =  true;			}		}	    //處理電腦遴選，由專家學者資料庫	    	    processMatDbExpertsList();	    //處理自行遴選，由專家學者資料庫	    processMatExternalExperts3List();	    //處理自行遴選，非專家學者資料庫	    processMatExternalExperts0List();	    //處理機關委員-非招標機關 --F108-05-08-001 	    processMatInternalExperts_1_List();	  	//處理機關委員-招標機關 --F108-05-08-001 	    processMatInternalExpertsList();	}	    var budgetAmount = "27289000";	var cpcType = "1"; // 標的分類(決標)	var procTrgCode = "5132"; // 標的分類代碼		var $jq=jQuery.noConflict();    if ($jq.cns == undefined) {    	$jq.cns = jQuery.cns;    }	$jq(document).ready(function(){		if ("1"!='2'  && "1"!='12'){							readyTreatyCheckText();		}				popWatermark();					$jq.blockUI({ message: $jq('#message_show'), css: {padding:'10px',overflow:'auto' }});			var height = Math.floor($jq(window).height()*0.6);			var width = Math.floor($jq(window).width()*0.8);			var top = Math.floor($jq(window).height()*0.2);			var left = Math.floor($jq(window).width()*0.1);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("width",width);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("height",height);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("left",left);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("top",top);			$jq('.blockUI.blockMsg').css("overflow","auto");						// 公共工程生態檢核注意事項 頁面載入		// 工程類且預算金額100萬以上		// 勞務類標案且標的分類為「8671建築服務」、「8672工程服務」、「8673綜合工程服務」、「8674都市計劃及景觀建築服務」		if((cpcType == "1" && budgetAmount >= 1000000 ) 				|| (cpcType == "3" && (procTrgCode == "8671" || procTrgCode == "8672" || procTrgCode == "8673" || procTrgCode == "8674"))){						$jq("#trIsPubEcological").show();		}else{			$jq("#trIsPubEcological").hide();		}	});		function popWatermark(){        var msgTop = 50;        var msgLeft = 500;                try{        	msgTop = $jq("#printArea").position().top+50;        	msgLeft = $jq("#printArea").position().left +$jq("#printArea").width()/2 +50;		}catch(e) {}				$jq("#hidden_message_id")        .css({            fontSize: "100px", //watermark font size             color: "brown", //watermark color             fontWeight: "bolder", //watermark font weight             fontFamily: "verdana", //watermark font family             position: "absolute", //watermark position 必須為 "absolute"             width: "100px", //watermark div width             top: msgTop, //watermark position top             left: msgLeft //watermark position left         })        .fadeTo("fast",0.3); //watermark 透明度 	}	function popWatermark2(){        var msgTop = 200;        var msgLeft = 500;		$jq("#hidden_message_id")        .css({            fontSize: "120px", //watermark font size             color: "brown", //watermark color             fontWeight: "bolder", //watermark font weight             fontFamily: "verdana", //watermark font family             position: "absolute", //watermark position 必須為 "absolute"             width: "120px", //watermark div width             top: msgTop, //watermark position top             left: msgLeft //watermark position left         })        .fadeTo("fast",0.3); //watermark 透明度 	}
決標公告公告日:111/02/24
該顯示之欄位包含未公告之欄位，如「採購金額」、依法不公開之「預算金額」等欄位(此段文字不會列印)

[本案採購契約是否採用主管機關訂定之範本]是[本案採購契約是否採用主管機關訂定之最新版範本]是[是否屬災區重建工程]否[是否已依照「公共工程開工要件注意事項」辦理]是[機關應辦事項檢核表檢核結果]機關應辦事項檢核表全部項目檢核結果為「無需辦理」或「已完成」
